details.brokersummary:
Charming 1-Bedroom in the Heart of Clinton Hill
Discover the perfect blend of comfort and convenience in this inviting 1-bedroom apartment, ideally situated in the vibrant Clinton Hill neighborhood. Located on the first floor of a well-kept, intimate building, this home offers everything you need for city living.
Apartment Highlights:
Modern stainless steel appliances for a sleek, updated feel Spacious eat-in kitchen, great for cooking and dining Well-sized bedroom providing both comfort and versatility Building Perks:
On-site laundry for added convenience Basement storage space available for extra belongings With its prime location and charming features, this apartment is a fantastic find. Schedule your viewing today!

Beautiful 1.5 bedroom apartment available in Williamsburg, prime location! Nice renovation!
This is the ideal opportunity to live in one of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods. Walk in to a spacious living area with an open kitchen and plenty of dining space. Large bedroom closet. Heat and hot water is included so no need to mind the thermostat. Enjoy a multitude of cafes in your community. Located just a few blocks to Williamsburg Smorgasburg/Flea Market. Cut your commute time to the city with the J, M, Z trains minutes from your door. Bring your small furry friends ? the building allows pets!
Easy commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods. Domino Park, Williamsburg Bridge, etc nearby.
Small pets welcome

Myspace Exclusive!
This must see 1br apartment has a massive living room, an updated kitchen with great cabinet space and stainless still appliances, multiple closets and hardwood floors throughout.
Laundromat is available just outside the building Heat and hot water included
Small pets OK Available 9/1

Virtual tour available!
Beautiful two bedroom apartment available in Williamsburg, prime location!
This is the ideal opportunity to live in one of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods. Walk in to a spacious living area with an open kitchen and plenty of dining space. Large bedroom closet. Heat and hot water is included so no need to mind the thermostat. Enjoy a multitude of cafes in your community. Located just a few blocks to Williamsburg Smorgasburg/Flea Market. Cut your commute time to the city with the J, M, Z trains minutes from your door. Bring your furry friends - the building allows pets!

Live next to the action in this 2 bedroom apartment located in prime downtown Bushwick! Stunning unit in a very convenient location and borderline East Williamsburg. Only 1 block away from the L Jefferson for a reduced commute, and next to Bushwick?s popular restaurants: Cafe Ghia, Bunna Cafe, Mominette Bistro! Laundry in building for your convenience & pet friendly building too!
Butcher block island separates kitchen from living room. See Video! (if you can?t see it check streeteasy or message and I?ll send it) These are 2 king sized bedrooms on opposite sides of the apartment with large closets! Amazing skyline views from the roof as well Just 1st and security to move in No fee
Message to see this right away!

2br duplex with basement for additional storage! Shared courtyard Hardwood floors Modern renovations Amazing location If you need a lot of space, this is the one. See video. Note additional toilet in the downstairs bathroom has been capped off to avoid any flooding issues. No fee pets ok Call or text to see right away

Lovely two bedroom apartment located in the heart of Bushwick. The apartment features hardwood floors throughout and a renovated kitchen with stainless steal appliances and butcher block bar/island. The large bedrooms have plenty of natural light to start your morning off right. The building is pet friendly and has laundry facility in the basement so no need to haul those heavy laundry bags. Great location just one block from Maria Hernandez Park, Jefferson L train stop and surrounded by popular taverns and cafes. No fee!

Beautifully renovated 2br in an elevator building. Has an amazing roof deck with skyline views. Laundry in the building as well. Primo location right off the Morgan stop of the L train. - Elevator- Laundry Room- Roof top with AMAZING view of Manhattan- Dishwasher, Microwave, Stainless Steel Appliances- Hardwood floors- Garage under the building ($300/mo)- Zip Cars available- Separate enclosed AC/Heating units for each room. Quiet and efficient?Just first and security deposit to move in, NO FEE!Pets OK!note: if you can't see the video please send me a message and I'll send it over.

Gorgeous 2BR/1BA in prime Bushwick. Large bedrooms on opposite end of the apartment Cutout window from front bedroom bringing light into living room as well as window in living room. Laundry in the building . Steps from both the L and M trains
See video on StreetEasy or send message and I?ll text it to you
Hardwood floors Renovated kitchen and bath Stainless steel appliances. Laundry in the building Less than a 5 minute walk from the BOTH the L and M train. Right in the center of Bushwick steps away from all you favorite local spots!
NO BROKER FEE! Just 1st and security to move in Pets ok
Call to take a look today!

Brand new 2.5 room / 1 bath with central air! Tons of light and high ceilings in this unit. Just one block from Myrtle/Wyckoff L/M stop! Laundry in the basement, LATCH smartlocks on all doors in the building!
This has been used as a 3br in the past but owners have dropped the price and advertising as a 2br. The 3br room has french doors that open to the living room area.
Please call or text to take a look today!

Huge 2br with window in every room including the living room and eat in kitchen! Tired of looking at tiny 2brs? This could be the one for you. Pre-war original details. Spacious and sunny
Huge separate living room with light coming from all sides so you have windows in all rooms. Large eat in kitchen with another window Huge king sized bedrooms on opposite sides of the apartment for maximum privacy Hardwood floors Renovated kitchen and bath Stainless steel appliances
Heat and hot water included!
1 block to the Halsey stop of the L train!
No fee Pets ok Call or text to view right away!

Lovely two bedroom apartment located in the heart of Bushwick. The apartment features hardwood floors throughout and a renovated kitchen with stainless steal appliances and butcher block bar/island. The large bedrooms have plenty of natural light to start your morning off right. The building is pet friendly and has laundry facility in the basement so no need to haul those heavy laundry bags. Great location just one block from Maria Hernandez Park, Jefferson L train stop and surrounded by popular taverns and cafes. No fee!

Beautiful 2BR/1bath apartment in Bushwick, prime location!
This 2 bedroom apartment features spacious living room, queen sized bedrooms . You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Mominette, Sea Wolf, Three Diamond Door, Precious Metal, The Rookery, Archie's, Heavy Woods, Idlewild, Clara's, Yours Sincerely, Chuko, Los Hermanos, Wheelhouse. Short commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Only few blocks from the L train, and a 8 minute walk to the J,M trains
Contact to schedule your appointment today!

Bright & Modern Apartment in a Charming Stuyvesant Heights Block ? Just Minutes to Manhattan!
Welcome to your new home in one of Brooklyn's most desirable neighborhoods! This beautifully updated apartment blends classic charm with modern conveniences, offering a stylish living space on a serene, tree-lined street in Stuyvesant Heights. Perfectly situated just minutes from Manhattan, this apartment boasts:
Exposed Brick: Adding character and warmth to your living space. High Ceilings: Creating a spacious and airy atmosphere. Hardwood Floors: Elegant, durable, and timeless. Video Intercom: Added peace of mind and security. Natural Light in the Living Area: Sun-drenched, bright, and welcoming. Eat-In Kitchen: Perfect for meals and gatherings with a view. Stainless Steel Appliances: Sleek, modern, and ready for your culinary adventures. Dishwasher: For effortless clean-up after meals. Gas Stove: Ideal for cooking enthusiasts. Central Air: Stay comfortable year-round, no matter the weather. Stone Countertops: Stylish and easy to maintain. Convenient Location:
Minutes from public transportation, including Utica Av (A, C) and Gates Av (J) subway stations, making your commute a breeze. Don?t miss out on the opportunity to live in this vibrant neighborhood, with a unique mix of history, culture, and modern amenities right outside your door. Schedule a showing today!

77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors
Building Amenities: -State-of-the-art fitness center -Relaxing sauna -Basketball and tennis courts -Inviting indoor pool with direct access to outdoor pool deck -Multiple BBQ grilling areas -Rooftop retreat offering panoramic views -Residents lounge and versatile working space -Entertainment-filled recreation room -Secure bicycle storage -Convenient elevators -Parking garage available (additional fee applies)
Location: Enjoy seamless access to the new esplanade and ferry terminal, ensuring swift commutes to Manhattan.

Welcome to Casa Hope Williamsburg?s new luxury development!
Sunny units with oversized windows throughout, and gorgeous finishes Steps from the L / G trains, commute to Union Square in only 13 minutes door to door!
Tons of building amenities:
Fitness center Rooftop terrace Business center On-site garage parking Lounge on 7th floor Mini lounge nook to each floor Elevator Bike room Parking garage (additional fee)
The kitchen comes equipped with brand new stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher. Gorgeous well-designed light wood cabinetry, white stone countertops and backsplashes. Modern bathrooms feature a deep soaking spa bathtub, as well as modern vanity with oversized mirror, storage cabinet space and matte black finishes. Other features include oak flooring throughout and generous closet space. Trash Chute to each floor.
Perfect location with an easy commute to the city and tons of restaurants, bars and cafes nearby Short walk from McCarren Park and the Bedford L train area

Experience Brooklyn living at 1010 Pacific St. You?ll find this community in the Prospect Heights area of Brooklyn. Experience a new standard at 1010 Pacific St.
Pacific House offers a collection of Studio, 1 and 2 Bedroom luxury apartments featuring expansive, open- concept layouts, oak floors and contemporary finishes. Residents also enjoy unparalleled access to first-class amenities, including fitness center, dedicated kids? areas, media lounge and bar and an expansive roof top with view of the city. Pacific House is centrally located in the heart of Brooklyn?s trendy prospect park neighborhood, and in close proximity to major transit hubs and an array of local amenities. Nearby shops, restaurants, schools, outdoor parks, neighborhood services, arts and culture are all within easy reach.

ABSOLUTELY MASSIVE, recently renovated 1 bed in Prime Crown Heights on the border of Prospect Heights ? can?t miss!
Very close to the Franklin Ave 2,3,4,5 and S trains Just minutes to Brooklyn favorites like Prospect Park, Brooklyn Museum & Brooklyn Botanic Garden Near all the best restaurants, cafes and bars in Crown Heights and Prospect Heights!
Renovated kitchen Brand new floors Brand new bathroom Tons of sun throughout Cats on approval. Sorry, no dogs?
Great owner/management!
First & security to move in No broker fee! 3/15 move in (4/1 also works)

Beautiful 2-Bedroom with City Views in Stuyvesant Heights!
Located at 930 De Kalb Avenue, this 2-bedroom, 1-bath apartment combines modern comfort with historic charm in the heart of Stuyvesant Heights.
Apartment Highlights:
Spacious bedrooms with ample room Sleek bathroom with stylish finishes Unique design elements across floors Elegant white marble staircase Building Perks:
Rooftop with stunning Manhattan skyline views Surrounded by historic brownstones Quick 25-minute commute to the city Close to J, M, and Z trains for easy transit Simple application process; guarantors accepted.
Don?t miss out on this mix of modern amenities and classic charm in one of Brooklyn?s top neighborhoods! Schedule a visit today!

Gut Renovated 3 Bed 2 Bath available!
Incredible location, right by Prospect Park!
Amenities: -Laundry room -Access to Roof deck with furniture -Bike room - Gym located at the basement
Outside the Apartment: -Steps away from Brower Park (Museum, Public Library, Basketball Court, Skate Park) -Centrally located near the 2,3,4 and 5 trains

Amazing location blocks from Prospect Park in Prospect Lefferts Gardens. Feel the history of Brooklyn on brownstone-lined streets and in locally owned bars, restaurants, coffee shops and more. Not only will you have the chance for somewhat of a city escape, but you will still have everything you need around you with full size grocers, pharmacies, bodegas, liquor stores, retail shops, tattoo shops, whatever your heart desires! You won?t be miss out on any luxuries inside your new home at The Ballgreen Complex either! Fully equipped with all a renter could need in NYC. Come on by and take a look with us!
Conveniently located off the 2, 5, and Q trains, as well as the B12, B35, B44, and B49 bus lines.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Central A/C and Heat Excellent light from extra large windows
BUILDING FEATURES: Elevator Fitness Center Laundry Room Tenant Lounge Finished Roof Deck Parking (by availability) Virtual Doorman

Beautiful 1 BR/ 1 bath apartment in Crown Heights, prime location! This 1 bedroom apartment features spacious living room, queen sized bedroom, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, and hardwood floors. You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Franklin Park, Two Saints, or just walking along Eastern Parkway. Short commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Only a few blocks from the 2,3, 4, and 5 trains.
February 1st move in Pets welcome

Charming 1 bed/1 bath in Prime Crown Heights!
Great location, near the 2,3,4,5 trains and around the corner from Franklin Ave known for it?s many trendy bars and restaurants!
UNIT FEATURES: ? Hot water included. ? Queen sized bedrooms ? Hardwood floors throughout ? L-shaped kitchen with stainless steel appliances and lots of cabinet and counter space ? Plenty of natural light ? Beautiful tiled bathroom with soaking tub
NO FEE Guarantors Accepted!

Lovely two-bedroom apartment available right off of Nostrand Ave nestled away on a tree-lined block! Private yard!
Reside in a gorgeous 2 bed / 1 bath apartment with spacious layout, hardwood floors, natural sunlight, modern features, and easy access to trains. Heat and hot water included.
To live in Crown Heights is to live in convenience and a diverse community. Enjoy the luxury of having access to most train lines like the 2,3,4,5 and C, or switch to any letter train at Atlantic terminal. Short distance to Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park, and Botanic Garden. Crown Heights offers a number of local restaurants and bars like Chavela?s, Dutch Boy, Cent?Anni, Drink Lounge, 99 Rogers, Mayfield, Cafe Rue Dix, Glady?s and more!
Easy commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods.
Available now Cats only (no dogs, sorry)

Easily practice safe social distancing with your own?Private. Unobstructed. Views. Of Manhattan. Built-in 2019, You?ll enjoy a generously-spaced 3-bed option, in the beautiful neighborhood of Astoria, yeah, green space and good bites, for days!
You?ll enjoy a super sun-lit 3 bedroom unit that can each room comfortably fit a queen-sized bed, dresser, tall wardrobe, make it your studio or even home gym or playroom for a little-one.
Make dinner without, having to clear your workspace all the time, and having a pet to help keep you company! After dinner, take a stroll through the neighborhood and check out everything.
Lucky for you you?re nestled on a residential block, close to shops, stores, and Transportation options are the N/Q at Broadway, and R/M at Steinway, an estimated 20 min. to Midtown? for those who commute.

This Ridgewood neighborhood backs right up to Bushwick, serving as it's older and wiser sibling. You can enjoy all of the same delicious cuisine, fair trade hot (and necessary) coffee, unique locally owned businesses, bodegas and grocers, and centralized transportation as it's neighboring Brooklyn areas.
Experience that side of life while also keeping that lovely community feel of the slightly more residential and peaceful Queens existence. You can have it both ways! Now top that all off with the fact this quiet building only has 6 units!! *long exhale* now that's the right choice.
Conveniently located off the M and L trains, as well as the B13, B20, B38, and Q39, and Q58 bus lines.
Pet Friendly First & Security NO FEE

BRAND NEW LUXURY BUILDING nestled in the vibrant Greenpoint neighborhood!!
APARTMENT FEATURES: Gleaming Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Appliances Central Air Conditioning & Heating Inquire about the availability of Private Balconies
BUILDING AMENITIES: Rooftop Deck with Stunning Views Elevator for Convenience On-Site Laundry Rooms State-of-the-Art Fitness Center Recreational Room Comfortable Tenant Lounge Package Room for Deliveries Bike Storage Parking available($300 monthly) Pet-Friendly Environment First & Security - NO BROKER FEE.
Conveniently located near L train at Lorimer and right next to McCarren Park.

A meticulously updated three-bedroom apartment DUPLEX WITH PRIVATE BACKYARD in the heart of Williamsburg, just moments away from the Montrose L subway station.
Spacious bedrooms with ample natural light Expansive communal living space Modern kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances and a convenient dishwasher Efficient electric heating and cooling units in every room Gleaming hardwood floors throughout Your own private BACKYARD for relaxation and outdoor enjoyment
Additional amenities include:
On-site laundry facilities A well-equipped gym A rooftop deck with stunning views

Nestled right between BedStuy and Crown Heights, this location offers the amazing old school vibe of Brooklyn AND the new luxury of of one of the quickest growing and most popular neighborhoods today. With all the conveniences of Atlantic Avenue around the corner and Franklin Avenue just down the street, you'll have everything you need nearby.
Conveniently off the A,C and LIRR trains as well as the B25, B43, and B44 bus routes.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Dishwasher and Microwave Central A/C and Heat Excellent light from extra large windows
BUILDING FEATURES: Bike Room Elevator Fitness Center Laundry Room Finished Roof Deck Parking (by availability)

BRAND NEW LUXURY BUILDING nestled in the vibrant Greenpoint neighborhood!!
APARTMENT FEATURES: Gleaming Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Appliances Central Air Conditioning & Heating Inquire about the availability of Private Balconies
BUILDING AMENITIES: Rooftop Deck with Stunning Views Elevator for Convenience On-Site Laundry Rooms State-of-the-Art Fitness Center Recreational Room Comfortable Tenant Lounge Package Room for Deliveries Bike Storage Parking available($300 monthly) Pet-Friendly Environment First & Security - NO BROKER FEE.
Conveniently located near L train at Lorimer and right next to McCarren Park.

Prime Crown Heights Living at 1499 Bedford Ave!
Discover the epitome of modern living at 1499 Bedford Ave, a new building in the heart of Crown Heights. Located steps from Eastern Parkway and multiple subway lines, and within walking distance of Grand Army Plaza, Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, and Prospect Park, this residence offers unparalleled convenience and vibrant city life.
Building Amenities:
State-of-the-art fitness room Pet wash station Laundry facilities (in-unit laundry in some units) Social lounge with game room Furnished rooftop with panoramic city views Second-floor public terrace Open workstations Dedicated mail room
Unit Features: Private terraces and balconies in select units Kitchen islands in select units Large windows with abundant natural light Stunning views of NYC skyline, Prospect Park, and neighborhood streets
Welcome to 1499 Bedford Ave?where luxury, community, and convenience meet. Experience the best of Crown Heights living.

This spacious and beautifully renovated 4 bedroom apartment is located on the third floor of a charming building in the heart of Ridgewood, Queens. The unit boasts an abundance of natural light, high ceilings, and hardwood floors throughout.
The apartment features a large open concept living and dining area, perfect for entertaining guests or relaxing with family. The modern kitchen is fully equipped with stainless steel appliances, including a gas range, refrigerator, and microwave as well as ample counter space and storage. Conveniently located off the M and L trains, as well as the B13, B20, B38, and Q39, and Q58 bus lines.
Building notes: Laundry in unit Pet Friendly First & Security NO FEE

BRAND NEW LUXURY BUILDING nestled in the vibrant Greenpoint neighborhood!!
APARTMENT FEATURES: Gleaming Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Appliances Central Air Conditioning & Heating Inquire about the availability of Private Balconies
BUILDING AMENITIES: Rooftop Deck with Stunning Views Elevator for Convenience On-Site Laundry Rooms State-of-the-Art Fitness Center Recreational Room Comfortable Tenant Lounge Package Room for Deliveries Bike Storage Parking available($300 monthly) Pet-Friendly Environment First & Security - NO BROKER FEE.
Conveniently located near L train at Lorimer and right next to McCarren Park.

Quiet convenience is the name of the game! Just a couple blocks off Myrtle-Wyckoff means restaurants, bars, coffee, FULL SIZE grocers (a boderline luxury in NYC), bodegas galore, and so much intersecting transportation! The list goes on as to why this neighborhood is one of the best in North Brooklyn. The greatest part of it all is that somehow, even with all that happening just around the corner, you can find a quiet calmness on these side streets. You'll really have it all!Conveniently located off the L and M trains, as well as the B13, B26, B52, B54, B60, Q55, and Q58 bus lines.UNIT FEATURES:Hardwood FloorsStainless Steel KitchenCentral A/C and heatBUILDING FEATURES:Laundry RoomFirst & SecurityNO FEE

This Ridgewood neighborhood backs right up to Bushwick, serving as it's older and wiser sibling. You can enjoy all of the same delicious cuisine, fair trade hot (and necessary) coffee, unique locally owned businesses, bodegas and grocers, and centralized transportation as it's neighboring Brooklyn areas.
Experience that side of life while also keeping that lovely community feel of the slightly more residential and peaceful Queens existence. You can have it both ways! Now top that all off with the fact this quiet building only has 6 units!! *long exhale* now that's the right choice.

Pet Friendly First & Security NO FEE

Perfect location right between McCarren Park and McGorlick Park in front and behind. Also between Nassau Ave and Driggs Ave on either side. This is a dream! You have a diner, a Portuguese restaurant, a Japanese restaurant, a Polish restaurant, a Korean restaurant, a coffee shop, a bakery, a tattoo shop, all only 1 BLOCK AWAY!! Pets are allowed in the bulding as well, so get ready to take Fido to not only 1, but 2 of Brooklyn's best parks! Conveniently located off the G train B43, B48, and B62 bus routes.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Sleek Black Kitchen Dishwasher Central A/C and Heat Private Balcony
BUILDING FEATURES: Elevator Laundry Room Finished Roof Deck Virtual Doorman

GORGEOUS BROWNSTONE!
1 bed 1 bath with private back yard!
Charming one bedroom on a lovely tree lined street! Fully renovated with all the updates you want, stainless steel appliances, granite counters, exposed brick and fully updated bath. Private yard!
Convenient to all the great shopping, dining and nightlife on Nostrand and Franklin Avenues. Short walk to either the A/C at Nostrand or Franklin and the Franklin 2,3,4,5 trains, from there it?s only a 20 minute ride to Manhattan.
Available now CATS ONLY, sorry no dogs. No broker fee

NO FEE! Gut renovated 2bed apartment on Bushwick Avenue!
PICTURES OF SIMILAR UNIT
Separate living room and kitchen
This recently renovated apartment is located in a well-maintained prewar building 2 bedroom and a huge recreation space downstairs offer a lot of space for all your needs. The light apartment has an open kitchen with a full-sized oven and huge fridge. You find ample closet space and storage. Pets are allowed on approval.

Introducing 581 Ocean, located in Kensington, alongside historical Ocean Parkway. 581 Ocean is a brand new luxury building offering 60 rental units.All units feature oversized windows, high-end modern appliances, gorgeous hardwood floors, and tasteful finishes throughout. Select units provide spacious balconies, patios, or private backyard spaces.Amenities include an elevator, lounge, gym, laundry room, bike storage, and parking garage.deally located on Ocean Parkway and 18th Avenue, you?ll have easy access to the B and Q trains at Newkirk Plaza as well as the F train at 18th Avenue and Ditmas Avenue stations. Prospect Park is just a 10 minute bike ride away.Make sure to enjoy all the diverse culture and dining this neighborhood has to offer.

Stylish, modern apartment features hardwood floors, stainless steel appliances, split heat & AC, dishwasher, and a fully tiled bathroom with a tub. Pet allowed and guarantor service available*
This high-end building includes a shared roof deck, virtual doorman system, and laundry room. Parking space for an additional monthly fee.
Within close proximity to the 2 and 5 subway lines and many cafes and restaurants.

Elevated Living at 527 Grand Ave in Prospect Heights
Welcome to 527 Grand Ave, a luxury community perfectly nestled in the vibrant Prospect Heights neighborhood. Offering 1 and 2 bedroom residences with spacious layouts, premium finishes, and thoughtful design, this property redefines modern living. Tons of natural sunlight throughout.
Residents enjoy unparalleled amenities, including: - A state-of-the-art fitness center - Expansive rooftop terrace with stunning skyline views - Dedicated children?s playroom - Business conference room for remote work and meetings - Convenient elevator access
Neighborhood Highlights: Prospect Heights is a blend of historic charm and contemporary culture. Stroll down tree-lined streets to uncover trendy restaurants, cozy cafes, and boutique shops. The iconic Prospect Park, Brooklyn Botanic Garden, and Brooklyn Museum are just steps away, offering lush green spaces and endless cultural experiences. Excellent transit options, including the A and C trains, make commuting to Manhattan and other parts of Brooklyn a breeze.
Live where convenience meets character. Schedule your tour today and make 527 Grand Ave your new home!

Step into the epitome of modern living at 1359 Nostrand Ave! With meticulously designed units and a wealth of building amenities, paired with easy access to transportation options, this is urban living at its finest.
The Units:
Thoughtfully designed layouts featuring hardwood floors throughout. Split A/C units for climate control. Stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher. 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and studio penthouse options available. Building Amenities:
Shared roof-deck with panoramic views. Secure bike room. Virtual doorman system. Laundry facilities.
Transportation:
Convenient access to multiple transportation options, including the 2/5/B/Q trains. This breakdown offers a clear and concise overview of the amenities available both within the units and throughout the building, as well as highlighting the transportation options in the vicinity.

Virtual tours available!Do not miss out on this 2 bed / 1 bath apartment in Brooklyn's up and coming neighborhood Prospect Lefferts Gardens! People forget that Brooklyn is the biggest borough and offers some of the best, historic architecture. Enjoy the neighborhood's easy access to the B,Q,2,3 lines, a number of bus lines, and short walk to Prospect Park. Live within steps to juice bars, grocery stores, restaurants, coffee shops, bars, pharmacies, banks, local bakeries, and more to explore. Brooklyn Greenery, MIdwood Flats, Irv's, Bluebird, Blessings, and Food Sermon are just a couple of the many options to check out in this vibrant neighborhood.Easy commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.
